page.title: 14Golspie-The countryside.
page.content: Some of the children in our class looked at the hills around Golspie and recorded some of the life we found. {The Pond}Bog mosses,mallard ducks,sedges,bog cotton,pond skaters,water rush,orchids,tadpoles, palmate newts,water skaters, louseworts and sedges. {Moorland}Heath,gorse,six varieties of moss,blaeberry,hard fern and orchids. {Woodland}Cinquefoil,Scots Pine,small Rowans,heather,crowberry,lichin and various cones. {The old pine forest} bracken,gorse,various mosses,hard fern,orchids,woodrush,willow trees and pine.
